title: The Loved One: An Anglo-American Tragedy
description: Described by the author as "a little nightmare produced by the unaccustomed high-living of a brief visit to Hollywood," THE LOVED ONE is an outrageously comic novel of the commercialzation of death itself. This book is not only satire at its most ferocious. It is a macabre frolic filled with laughter and ingenious devices.
author: Evelyn Waugh
